name: innerspace-lite
description:
Go into the shrink beam with your spaceship so you can enter a pacient's brain and destroy the invasion of freezers and heaters before the fever causes havoc!

This is a tribute to the film Innerspace and the videogame Asteroids, mixed with the Godot Jam 2018 theme of Temperature.

Try to infer the mechanics, they're pretty easy once you play one or two rounds. I hope you enjoy it as much as I did coding it!

Thx to Godot maintainers for such a nice engine!

How to play:
Use left and right arrows to rotate the capsule and up to shoot. You can also use AWSD and any GamePad.

Source code:
Source code can be found in my Github repository.
